children.name: test_build_and_deploy
tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='Skips juju <3.1.x as we have a dependency for self-signed-certificates')

children.name:
asyncio.exceptions.TimeoutError: Timed out waiting for model:
mysql-test-app/0 [idle] waiting:

AssertionError: None of the units are upgraded

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message

mysql-router-k8s  8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s                 0  10.152.183.211  no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   46  10.152.183.107  no       

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address      Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.187.9          Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0*  active       idle   10.1.187.10         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+266066c

mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.187.14         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.187.13         
'
